ygData.subject: Hail
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail to all my Holy Brothers and Sister, My name is Valiance.  I am a dwarven Paladin of the 10th order.  I am just introducing myself.  I hope to meet many of
ygData.messageBody:
Hail to all my Holy Brothers and Sister,
My name is Valiance. I am a dwarven Paladin of the 10th order. I am
just introducing myself. I hope to meet many of you and hopefully
adventure with you all. I do have one place of interest for those of
you whom have not visited my homeland of Kaladim. There is an area
called teh chessboard. Many undead, but be forewarned tis not an easy
fight(all the fights that are worth it are that way)

Valiance
Paladin of Underfoot
"Be as the stone; strong. Your faith will protect you."
Quote from Brell Serilis, The Duke of Below
